title: Announcing General by Kevin Dresser
content:
General by Kevin Dresser was released today. Kevin Dresser worked for a number of years at The Hoefler Type Foundry, before striking out on his own with [Dresser Johnson](http://web.archive.org/web/20150330072724/http:/www.dresserjohnson.com/) and pursuing [painting](http://web.archive.org/web/20150330072724/http:/www.kdee.net/) endeavours.   
   
 ![kd](http://web.archive.org/web/20150330072724im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/72/12463.gif)   
   
This fifteen-font family could best be described in the Helvetica / Akzidenz / Trade Gothic vein, with its own subtleties to make it unique.   
   
Watch for an exclusive behind-the-design with Kevin Dresser in the coming weeks as we talk to him about his design process, sketches and the inspiration that led to General's creation.   
   
 [Buy it](http://web.archive.org/web/20150330072724/http:/www.dresserjohnson.com/retailfonts.html)
author: Jared Benson
